No response wait time.
RW
00000111
Defines the time after the no response interrupt is sent. It starts from the end of TX.
RX no response wait range is 25.6us to 6528us (1..255),
Step size 25.6us.
Interrupt is sent in case the time runs out before 6-10 periods of link frequency is detected.
Gen2: T1max=23.6us .. 262us.

No response wait time.

RX wait time
RW
00000111
Defines the time during which the RX input is ignored. It starts from the end of TX.
RX wait range is 6.4us to 1632us (1..255),
Step size 6.4us,
00: receiver enabled immediately after TX.
Gen2: T1min=11.28us .. 262us,
ISOA: 150 .. 1150us
ISOB: 85 .. 460us

No response interrupt
R
0
Signals to MCU that next slot command can be sent

Preamble detect error /RX finished
R
0
Signals to MCU that there was an error during preamble detection /
Rx is finished in case fifo_dir_irq2=1(reg1A)

RX count error
R
0
Signals to MCU that reception was shorter than expected (see RX length (1A, 1B) register definition)

Header bit / 2 bytes
R
0
Received header bit is high /Two bytes already in FIFO in case fifo_dir_irq2=1(reg1A)

CRC error
R
0
Reception CRC

Signals the FIFO is 2/3 full or FIFO less than 1/3
R
0
Signals FIFO high or low

IRQ set due to RX start
R
0
Signals the RX was received and RX is in progress. Interrupt when RX is finished.

IRQ set due to end of TX
R
0
Signals the TX is in progress. Interrupt when TX is finished.

in case pr_ask=1 or ook_ask=1:
adjust delimiter length, range 9.6ms to 15.9ms, step 0.1ms. 1D=12.5ms

ASK modulation depth/PR delimiter adjust
RW
1F
in case pr_ask=0 and ook_ask=0:
003E: ASK modulation depth, 3F: 100%,
in case pr_ask=1 or ook_ask=1:
adjust delimiter length, range 9.6ms to 15.9ms, step 0.1ms. 1D=12.5ms

PR-ASK enable
RW
1
In case Tari is 25us the ook_ask bit defines delimiter transient in PRASK modulation mode: ook_ask=1 forces ASK shaped transient, ook_ask=0 forces PRASK shaped transient. In case Tari is 12.5us or 6.25us the ASK delimiter transient is used regardless ook_ask bit value.
ASK shaped delimiter transient offers correct and adjustable delimiter length. The TX spectrum is not affected to a visible level due to ASK delimiter transient. Other field transitions are done in PRASK mode.

Selects linear modulation transient
RW
0
Default is shaped modulation transient for ASK and PR-ASK modulation.

Direct FIFO and 2nd byte IRQ
R
0
All bytes including CRC are transferred to FIFO, irq_header is changed to irq_2ndbyte, irq_err3 is changed to irq_RX_finished. For PC+EPC reception .
